Uses of Package
uk.ac.liv.auction.stats

Packages that use uk.ac.liv.auction.stats
uk.ac.liv.auction The top-level package for JASA classes. 
uk.ac.liv.auction.agent Classes defining trading agents and strategies 
uk.ac.liv.auction.core The core classes used by JASA 
uk.ac.liv.auction.electricity   
uk.ac.liv.auction.stats Classes for calculating auction statistics 
uk.ac.liv.auction.ui User-interface auction components 
uk.ac.liv.auction.zi Classes for implementing "zero-intelligence" experiments.

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.stats used by uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
DailyStatsReport
          A report that collects price statistics for each trading day.
HistoricalDataReport
           A report that keeps a historical record of the shouts in the market that lead to the last N transactions.
PriceStatisticsReport
           A report that keeps cummulative statistics on bid prices, ask prices, transaction prices, and market quote prices.

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.stats used by uk.ac.liv.auction.electricity
AbstractAuctionReport
           An abstract implementation of AuctionReport that provides functionality common to all reports.
AbstractMarketStatsReport
          A report that performs additional calculations at the end of an auction before producing its results.
AuctionReport
           
DirectRevelationReport
          This class computes the hypothetical auction state when all agents bid at their private valuation, ie when all agents bid truthfully.
EquilibriumReport
           A class to calculate the true equilibrium price and quantity ranges for a given auction.
PriceStatisticsReport
           A report that keeps cummulative statistics on bid prices, ask prices, transaction prices, and market quote prices.
ReportVariable
          A class representing a variable produced by an AuctionReport.
SurplusReport
          A report that calculates the actual surplus of buyers and sellers in the auction verses the theoretical surplus when trades occur at the equilibrium price.

          This class writes auction data to the specified DataWriter objects, and thus can be used to log data to eg, CSV files, a database backend, etc.

          This class computes the hypothetical auction state when all agents bid at their private valuation, ie when all agents bid truthfully.

           A report that keeps track of the surplus available to each agent in theoretical equilibrium.

          A class defining the common properties and methods of data series and markers.

          Defines a marker on a JFreeChart graph, which can be a point, a line, etc.
FreeChartReport
          A report that logs data to JFreeChart graphs.
FreeChartSeries
          Defines a data series to be included in FreeChartGraph.

GraphReport

          a class to speed up queries from GDStrategy regarding the number of shouts above or below a certain price.
HistoricalDataReport.SortedView
          a class providing sorted lists of shouts.
MeanValueDataWriterReport
          This report keeps track of the mean value of each market variable over the course of each round of bidding and logs the mean value to the specified DataWriter objects.
